entry.title: Today in DeFi - Gyroscope Launches GYD Stablecoin, Safe Introduces Recovery Hub , Marginfi to Launch Solana LST-backed Stablecoin, High Yield Staking on Avalanche, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Gyroscope launches GYD, a dollar-pegged stablecoin backed by reserve assets, and features an algorithmic mechanism to keep its price pegged to $1. Users can now mint GYD or provide liquidity to GYD pools. Crypto Volatility Index launches CVI V4, introducing new features such as the Hedged Theta Vault, a ~3x stretched version of the CVI, borrower leverage, etc.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Aevo Launches Yield-Bearing aeUSD, Worldcoin Decentralizing, New Lending Pool with OP Rewards, No Fee Swaps with Airdrop, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Aevo launches aeUSD, a yield-bearing stables-denominated collateral asset (5% USDC and 95% sDAI) that allows users to earn a 4.75% APY on their exchange margin while trading with 20x leverage. QuickSwap launches QuickSwap Bonds on the DEX, a new way for liquidity provision. Users can provide liquidity and receive tokens at a discount that vest over time, represented by a Bond NFT.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Helium Launches $20 Unlimited Mobile Plans, Matcha Launches Cross-chain Swaps, Premia Blue Season, Upcoming Airdrop on Solana, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Helium Mobile launches a nationwide plan in the US. with unlimited data, text, and talk that costs $20 a month. Helium Mobile combines the Solana-based IoT project Helium Network and a nationwide 5G network. Hashflow DEX launches 2.0. The upgraded version enables Smart Order Routing (SOR), improved UX, and Solana expansion.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Mantle Launches mETH LSD, Osmosis Merger Proposal, 20%+ Stable Farms, Upcoming TGE Analysis, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Mantle L2 launches two products: Mantle LSP and mETH. Mantle LSP is a liquid staking protocol that enables users to stake ETH for mETH and earn rewards. Updates 🆕 Aave DAO proposes to increase the GHO borrow rate from 5.35% APR to 6.35% APR to support the GHO peg restoration and align borrowing costs with market rates.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Obol Mainnet Live, Platypus Hackers Acquitted, Rhino Announces New Token, High Stable Yields, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Obol Mainnet Live Obol launched Mainnet Open Beta with three products available: Mainnet DV Launchpad, Obol SDK, and Obol Splits. StarkDefi on Starknet StarkDeFi launches an AMM on Starknet Mainnet, with other features coming soon: Farm, Launchpad, Quest, etc.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - RageTrade V2 Beta Live, Sei Announces V2, Poolshark Announces FIN, Moonwell Rewards on Base, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Nov 27th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Yearn V3 Live, Hacker Demands to Take Over Kyber, Cega Dual Currency Strategies, Optimized LPing on Solana, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Yearn V3 Live on Polygon Yearn V3 introduces Tokenized Strategies, allowing for standalone, single-strategy vaults that are ERC-4626 compatible. V3 is now on Polygon and will be rolling out slowly, with new Vaults and strategies added over time ahead of launching on other chains.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - SDX Live on Solana, QuickSwap Smart Pools on Manta, Kujira Futures Soon, Easy and Profitable LPing, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 SDX Live on Solana Solana Derivatives Exchange (SDX) launches on Solana. SDX enables options trading on Solana, with mSOL as the first supported option market. Econia Live on Aptos Econia, a Dragonfly-backed on-chain order book, launches on Aptos mainnet. Econia provides the infrastructure and allows users to trade with their frontend partners such as Aries Markets, Gator Trade, KanaLabs, etc.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Velodrome & Aerodrome Frontend Exploit, StakeWise V3 Live, Cryptex V2 on Arbitrum, NFT Lending on Solana, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 StakeWise V3 Live StakeWise V3 is now live on the Ethereum mainnet. V3 introduces a new approach to liquid staking, “any node operator and staker on Ethereum can mint osETH, a liquid staking token, to represent ETH staked on their nodes.” V3 also comes with a marketplace of staking offers through smart contracts called Vaults.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Call for Cosmos Chain Split, Timeswap Premine on Polygon zkEVM, JITO Token and Airdrop, Yield Boosted LPing, and more...
entry.summary: Updates 🆕 Call for Cosmos Chain Split In response to a recently passed proposal that reduces ATOM inflation, Cosmos founder Jae Kwon called for a chain split and referred to the hard fork as AtomOne. The forked chain would support the ATOM token along with the native ATOM1.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Cosmos to Reduce ATOM Inflation , TreasureDAO to Launch Treasure Chain, Osmosis Halted for 2 Hours, Today in DeFi Cyber Monday Sale, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Nov 20th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - RainFi NFT Lending on Solana, dYdX Trading Rewards Coming, Automated LPing with Good Rewards, Today in DeFi Black Friday Sale, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 RainFi on Solana RainFi, a P2P NFT lending protocol on Solana, is live. RainFi lets users lend SOL/USDC/mSOL, and borrow SOL using their NFT as collateral. IOTX Liquid Staking Bedrock launches liquid staking for IOTX. IOTX holders can now stake IOTX to receive reward-accruing uniIOTX.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - KyberSwap 47M Exploit, HecoChain & HTX 110M Exploit, Deri V4 Live, Liquid Staking on Cosmos, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Dyson Full Version Release Dyson DEX has deployed its full version on Polygon zkEVM and launched the DYSN token. Besides Swaps and Dual Investment, the full version enables the Membership Program, Boosting, and Staking. Asymetrix V2 Live

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Beta Finance V2, Dyson Full Launch Soon, Aragon Sues Its Founding Team, Invest in Delta-Neutral Pools, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 Beta Finance V2 Live Beta Finance launches V2 (Omni), a lending market with risk tranches. V2 enables users to choose their level of exposure based on their individual risk appetites. ZKP2P Alpha Live ZKP2P launches an alpha version on Base L2. ZKP2P is a trustless fiat-to-crypto onramp protocol powered by ZKPs.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Phantom Wallet Cross-Chain Swaps, Blast L2 Early Access, Range CAKE Bonus, Dydx Insurance Fund Exploited for 9M, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Nov 13th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Kamino V2 on Solana, Perpetual Earn Dashboard, Ether.fi Public Launch, Best Project Picks, and more...
entry.summary: Launches 🚀 1inch Portfolio Tracking 1inch launches a new portfolio tracking feature, allowing users to manage multiple wallets across networks from one place. Kamino Launches V2 Solana-based lending Kamino launches v2 with a new UI, upgraded risk management, and new defi tools.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - IntentX Perp Dex on Base, Nocturne Privacy Live, JPMorgan Tokenizing Assets with Avalanche, Earn with Idle NFTs, and more...
entry.summary: IntentX Perp Dex on Base IntentX launches an intent-based perp dex with over 180 perpetual markets on Base L2, providing a CEX-like trading experience. Nocturne Privacy Live Privacy protocol Nocturne has deployed its v1 on the Ethereum mainnet, introducing the concept of on-chain private accounts to Ethereum.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Dopex V2 Live, Armada V2 on Solana, LayerZero Launches USDV, LPing Made Simple, and more...
entry.summary: Dopex V2 Live Dopex launches V2 with CLAMM officially available with Yield boosting & optimization for v3 LPs, and American-style options for traders. Armada V2 Solana-based Armada launches V2 SPL Token Staking and DeMUX. SPL is a governance plugin that allows token holders to vote on DAO proposals while also staking their tokens to receive rewards, and DeMUX allows for semi-automated protocol reward distribution.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Butter Finance Cancelled, Real Estate Trading on Solana, Vertex LBA Live, Trading Perps on Solana, and more...
entry.summary: Butter Finance Canceled Butter Fnance announces cancelation for the project as "contributors found the proposed veCAKE system & incentives model to be impractical for a path forward for Butter." Parcl V3 on Solana Solana-based real estate trading protocol

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Raft Exploited for 6.7M, Pika Retiring Token, Ether.fi Launches eETH, RocketPool Announces Houston Upgrade, and More...
